Taiwan's new president faces 'tough' time with China pressure, no parliament majorityTaiwan's president-elect Lai Ching-te could face a tough four years in office with no parliamentary majority, an opposition which wanted to re-start a vexed service trade deal with China and the ever present threat of military action from Beijing. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 06:20:44 GMT 4A5R4DRA35MQDDNS4FYVJJUTNM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwans-new-president-faces-tough-time-with-china-Pressure-no-parliament-2024-01-14/Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu, James Pomfret世界亚太地区
North Korea fires possible ballistic missile, Japan saysNorth Korea fired a ballistic missile off its east coast on Sunday, South Korea said. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 06:06:27 GMT M5D7UYHSJZOYXM2BLG2S3XB6OY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-fires-missile-south-korea-says-2024-01-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
Pakistan's Imran Khan's party loses cricket bat electoral symbolPakistan's Supreme Court on Saturday rejected an attempt by former prime minister Imran Khan's party to retain its traditional electoral symbol of a cricket bat, in the latest setback for the jailed leader ahead of a general election. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 05:56:55 GMT OQPMNA23OBLDVEVTJOLJZ7SNL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistans-imran-khans-party-loses-cricket-bat-electoral-symbol-2024-01-14/Asif Shahzad世界亚太地区
Hundreds of firefighters battle Western Australia wildfireHundreds of firefighters on Sunday battled an out-of-control bushfire near Western Australia's capital Perth, prompting authorities to urge residents in the fire's path to flee. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 04:56:00 GMT Z3XVMMRDGZN6XNZTKEH5QNCVG4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hundreds-firefighters-battle-western-australia-wildfire-2024-01-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
President Tshisekedi's ruling party leads in Congo legislative electionDemocratic Republic of Congo President Felix Tshisekedi's UDPS party won 66 seats in the December parliamentary election, placing it ahead of 44 other parties that won one or more seats in the 500-member house, provisional results showed on Sunday. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 04:45:14 GMT LCOWW6HFMNMA5MRTWF2FX52WGI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/president-tshisekedis-ruling-party-leads-congo-legislative-election-2024-01-14/Ange Kasongo世界非洲
China opposes Japan's congratulatory message to Taiwan president-electThe Chinese embassy in Japan said on Sunday that it "resolutely opposed" Japanese Foreign Minister Yoko Kamikawa's statement congratulating Taiwan's new president-elect Lai Ching-te. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 04:19:52 GMT 5VL3BZEA4BKTTN5NDUXAAQ7WT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-opposes-japans-congratulatory-message-taiwan-president-elect-2024-01-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
World reactions to Taiwan electionFollowing are reactions by some foreign leaders and other officials to the result of Saturday's election in Taiwan, won by the ruling Democratic Progressive Party's (DPP) presidential candidate Lai Ching-te. Lai's party champions Taiwan's separate identity and rejects China's territorial claims. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 03:22:48 GMT R343RC2N7BJKBL4KTOHORYR2RA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/world-reactions-taiwan-election-2024-01-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
Three migrants drown at US border as Texas, White House feudA woman and two children drowned in the Rio Grande as they tried to the enter the U.S. from Mexico on Friday night after Texas military officers prevented federal border officials from aiding them, U.S. border officials and a member of Congress said. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 01:34:39 GMT L4OUY525OFJMZPS4CKOMTWQIPA https://www.reuters.com/world/us/third-migrants-drown-us-border-amid-dispute- Between-texas-white-house-2024-01-14/Jonathan Allen世界美国
Denmark awaits new king, as Queen Margrethe to bow outQueen Margrethe II, Denmark's longest reigning monarch, is due to pass the throne to her first-born son Frederik on Sunday and tens of thousands of Danes are expected to gather in the streets of Copenhagen to witness the historic succession. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 00:11:13 GMT ERIWZHUQ6BPIXKU4HYNMHZOBEA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/denmark-awaits-new-king-queen-margrethe-bow-out-2024-01-14/Stine Jacobsen, Johannes Birkebaek世界欧洲
Explainer: What's the Israel-Palestinian conflict about and how did it start?Israel and Hamas have been waging war for 100 days since gunmen from the Palestinian militant group went on the rampage in southern Israel, triggering an Israeli military campaign in which nearly 24,000 Palestinians have been killed. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 00:08:56 GMT M6CEQJRP2VPCVI7JE3C743ONY4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/whats-israel-palestinian-conflict-about-how-did-it-start-2024-01-14/Reuters世界中东
All Ecuador prison staff held hostage by inmates now free, officials sayAll prison staff held by inmates at prisons in Ecuador amid a sharp uptick in violence had been freed by Saturday evening, the SNAI prisons agency said. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 22:24:52 GMT 7FUTXTXOHZJG7IO2QXS2A7IYWI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/eleven-prison-guards-held-hostage-ecuador-prison-freed-police-2024-01-13/Alexandra Valencia世界美洲
